309b1(mdo): yul 'khor dang / pho brang 'khor du 'jug pa la byang chub sems dpa' ni ma yin no// rang gi nyon mongs pa la nyan thos spyod kyi/ sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa la byang chub sems dpa' ni ma yin no//
309b2(mdo): btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na gang dang gang la nyan thos smod pa de dang de la byang chub sems dpa' ni ma yin no// sha ra dwa ti'i bus smras pa/ bu mo stobs gang gis de smod par myi 'gyur ba'i byang chub sems dpa' stobs
309b3(mdo): kar yan// bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu brgyad po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i stobs te/ des de smod par myi 'gyur ro// brkyang kang zhe na/ khong 'phro ba myed pa'i sems kyis byams pa'i stobs
309b4(mdo): dang / sems can yongs su sbyin par byed pas snying rje'i stobs dang / bcos ma ma yin pas lhag pa'i bsam pa'i stobs dang / nyon mongs pa dang bral bas shes rab kyi stobs dang / yongs su myi skyo bas thabs
309b5(mdo): kyi stobs dang / zhum pa myed pa bsod nams kyi stobs dang / kA ti mug dang bral ba ye shes kyi stobs dang / sngon dam bcasapa nyams 'og tu chud par byed pas brtson 'grus kyo stobs te//
309b6(mdo): btsun sha ra dwa ti'i bu brgyad po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i sto/ sa te/ stobs de dag gis de myi smod do// gnas gtan gis smras pa/ ci bu mo khyod stobs 'di lta bu dang ldan nam/ bu mos
309b7(mdo): smras pa/ btsun pa sha ra dnga'i bu ldan te/ gang mnyam pa nyid kyis ldan no// gang mnyam pa nyid kyis mnyam par gnas so// btsun bzhar da ti bu gang mnyam pa den stobs ma yin/ nyam chung ba ma yin te/
309b8(mdo): de ni mnyam pa nyid do// gang mnyam pa de la ni ba dang du bya ba chung zad kyang myed do// mnyam pa zhes bya ba ni nam mkha' ste/ chos thams cad ni nam mkha' dang mnyam mo/ ji ltar na nam mkha' snang ba myed cing za
309b9(mdo): ka ba myed pa de bzhin du/ chos thams cad kyang nam mkha' ltar snang ba myed cing / bla gab myed pa'o// kang de ltar mnyam pa de ni nyam chung ba ma yin/ stobs dang ldan pa ma yin mod kyi// 'on kyang btsun pa
310a1(mdo): sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' kang nyam chung ba de ni stobs dang ldan pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang nyon mongs pa nyam chung ba de ni ye shes kyi stobs dang ldan pa'o// gang ser sna nyam
310a2(mdo): chung ba de ni sbyin pa'i stobs dang ldan pa'o// ka sar sna nyam chung ba da na// kang ngang tshul ngan pa de ni tshul khrims kyi stobs dang ldan pa'o// kang gnod sems nyam chung ba de ni bzod pa'i stobs dang ldan pa'o// kang /
310a3(mdo): le lo nyam chung ba de ni brtson 'grus kyi stobs dang ldan pa'o// gang g.yeng ba nyam chung ba de ni bsam gtan gi stobs dang ldan pa'o// gang 'chal pa'i shes rab nyam chung ba de ni shes rab kyi stobs dang ldan pa'o//
310a4(mdo): de bzhin du chos thams cad de gang dang gang las byang chub sems dpa' myi dge ba nyam chung ba de dang de las de dge ba'i stobs dang ldan no// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ bu mo rin cen la legs
310a5(mdo): so zhes bya ba gnang ste/ bu mo legs so legs so// tsau ste bstand pa lta na de ltar bstan par bya'o// bstan pa 'di// bshad pa na byang chub sems dpa' lnga brgya bzod pa skyes so//
310a6(mdo): de nas bcom ldan 'das la bu mo rin cen gyis 'di skad ces ka so lad to// bcom ldan 'das gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu po de dag dge ba'i rtse ba gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa
310a7(mdo): 'istobs bcu dang ldan par gyur// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bu mo rin chen la 'di skad ces bka' stsald to// bu mo byang chub sems dpa' gang gi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'i
310a8(mdo): spyod pa spyod pa na/ zag pa dman pa 'dod cing bya ba ma yin pa byed par 'gyur ba 'di ni gnas ma yin te/ skabs myed do// de yi dam la brtan po'i stobs 'di dang ldan pas/ byang chub snying po mchog dam par song
310a9(mdo): nas gnas dang gnas ma yin pa mkhyen pa'i stobs thob ste/ gnas la yang gnas dang / gnas ma yin pa la yang gnas ma yin par yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pa 'di ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i
310b1(mdo): stobs dang po ste/ stobs de thob pas de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor gi nang du seng ge'i sgra yang dag par spogs ste/ khyu mchog gi gnas su dam/ 'cha' zhing / dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am/ lha 'am/ bdud dam/
310b2(mdo): tshangs pa 'am/ gang gis kyang 'jig rten du chos dang mthun par ma bskor ba'i tshangs pa'i 'khor lo rab tu skor ro// bu mo gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i bakhyad pa gyod pa na/ rang gi las las gyu rad pa/ las
310b3(mdo): kyi rnam par smin pa la gton pa yin te/ de las kyi rnam par smyin pa'i stobs 'di dang ldan pas/ byang chub thob pa na 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i las dang / las yang dag par blangs pa
310b4(mdo): rnam par smin pa mkhyen pa/ gnas dang rgyus yang dag pa ji lta da ba bzhin tu rab tu shes pa 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs gnyis pa ste/ stobs de thob pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'khon
310b5(mdo): gi nang du seng ge'i sgra yang dag par sgrogs ste/ khyu mchog gi gan/ sa su dam 'cha' zhing / dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am/ lha 'am/ bdud dam/ tshangs pa 'am/ gang gis kyang 'jig rten du
310b6(mdo): chos dang mthun par ma bskord pa'i tshangs pa'i 'khor lo rab tu bskor ro// bu mo gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dang li pyad pa spyod pa na/ sems can rnams kyi dbang po la brtags nas/
310b7(mdo): chos ston te de dag shes nas dbang po rnams ji lta ba bzhin du 'jug cing / dbang po rnams ji lta ba dang ldan te/ de dbang po'i rim pa mkhyen pa'i stobs 'di dang ldan pas/ byang chub thob pa na sems can gzhan
310b8(mdo): narnams dang / gang zag gzhan dag gi dbang po dang bsngon 'grus kyi rim pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes te/ bu mo de bzhin gshegs pas gang sem na gzhan rnams dang / gang zag gzhan dag gi
310b9(mdo): dbang po dang / brtson 'grus kyi rim pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pa 'di ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs gsum pa'o// bu mo gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa
311a1(mdo): spyod pa na/ sems can rnams kyi khams la 'jug ste/ zhugs nas/ sems can rnam kyi mos pa ji lta ba dang / khams ji lta ba bzhin du gnas so// de khams la 'jug pa'i stobs 'di dang ldan pas/
311a2(mdo): byang chub thob pa na/ khams du ma dang / khams sna tshogs pa'i 'jig rten yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pa 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bzhi pa'o// bu mo gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' byang chub seMs
311a3(mdo): dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ sems can mos pa tha dad pa rnams kyi mos pa dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes kun tu tshol te/ de ltar mos pa la smod do// de mos pa'i stobs 'di dang ldan pas/ byang chub thob pa
311a4(mdo): na/ sems can gzhan rnams dang / kang zag gzhan dag ki mos pa tu ma dang / mos pa sna tshogs yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhi na du rab tu shes pa 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs lnga pa'o//
311a5(mdo): bu mo gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na / 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas dang / nyan thos kyi theg pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang / theg pa chen po thams
311a6(mdo): cad du ye shes gtong ngo // de kun tu 'gro ba mkhyen pa'i stobs 'di dang ldan pas byang chub thob pa na/ kun tu 'gro ba'i lam yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pa 'di ni de bzhin gshegs
311a7(mdo): pa'i stobs drug pa'o// bu mo gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ bsam gtan dang ting nge 'dzin lhur len pa yin te/ sems nges par rtog cing nyon mongs pa
311a8(mdo): dang bral te dul zhing cang shes so// de cang shes kyi stobs 'di dang ldan pas/ byang chub thob pa na/ sems can gzhan rnams dang gang zag gzhan dag gi bsam gtan dang / rnam par tha rad pa dang / ting nge
311a9(mdo): 'dzind dang / snyoms par 'jug pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba dang / ldan pa thams cad mkhyend pa'i stobs yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pa 'di ni/ de bzhin gshegs
311b1(mdo): pa'i stobs bdun pa'o// bu mo gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ sngon gyi rgyu las byung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba chud myi gzon te/ bag yod pa yin/ sngon dam bcas pa
311b2(mdo): las myi nyams pa yin no// de sngon gi rgyu las byung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba chung myi kazon pa'i stobs 'di dang ldan pas/ byang chub thob pa na/ bdag dang sems can gzhan rnams dang / gang zag gzhan dag gi
311b3(mdo): sngon gi gnas rnam pa tu ma rjes su dran pa'i mkhyend pa'i stobs yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du shes pa 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs brgyad pa'o// bu mo gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' byang chub
311b4(mdo): sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ sems can gang yang smra bgo/ nga bar myi byed la/ ma bslabs pa la dbang mya za zhing / sems can thams cad la snang bar gyur pa yin no// de snang ba'i
311b5(mdo): stobs 'di dang ldan pas byang chub thob pa na/ lha'i myig/ gi shwe pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pa 'di ni re/ bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dgu pa'o// bu mo gzhan
311b6(mdo): yang byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod/ pa na/ sems can gang gi zag 'phel ba'i phyir yang gnas pa ma yin gyi/ zag pa zad pa'i bya ba'i phyir sems can
311b7(mdo): rnams la chos ston te// zag pa 'phel bar bya ba'i phyir ma yin gi/ zag pa myed pa'i lam gyis sems can rnams la lam nye bar spyond to// de mos pa zag pa myed pa'i stobs 'di dang ldan pas byang chub
311b8(mdo): thob pa na/ zag pa thams cad zad pa mkhyend pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab shes pa 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu pa'o// bu mo de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ste/ byang chub
311b9(mdo): sems dpas de dag rdzogs par byas nas/ stobs bcu dang ldan pa'i de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur ro// bu mo de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sa de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu rab tu dbye' ba 'di
312a1(mdo): dag zos nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa sgo bcu po 'di dag yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir/ ci nas kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams la 'jug par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das la bu mo rin cen gyis yang
312a2(mdo): ba'adi skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gang myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad po 'di dag dang ji ltar ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / sangs
312a3(mdo): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad rab tu thob par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// bu mo 'di la byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i pyod pa spyad pa na/ gzhan gis shes par myi
312a4(mdo): bya'o snyam nas/ slob dponan yang chos 'chab par myi byed de/ sems can thams cad la sems snyoms pa yin// bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong zhing chos mnyam pa nyid du mthong ba yin/
312a5(mdo): tha dad pa'i 'du shes dang bral ba yin te/ de byang chub thob pa nas seng ge'i sgra yang dag par sgrog ste/ nga yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas so zhes dam bcas pa la chos 'di
312a6(mdo): lta bu zhig mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas so zhes 'dir pal dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am/ lha 'am/ bdud dam/ tshangs pa 'am/ su yang rung ste/ 'jig rten na chos dang
312a7(mdo): 'thun pas rgol bar 'gyur ba'i mtshan ma yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ngo // mtshan ma de yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas/ de bzhin gshegs pas bde ba brnyes pa dang / 'jigs pa myed pa brnyes pa dang /
312a8(mdo): myi 'jigs pa brnyes pa yin te/ 'khor gi nang du seng ge'i sgra yang dag par sgrog cing / khyu mchog gi gnas su dam 'cha' ste/ dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am/ lga 'am/ bdud dam/ tshangs pa
312a9(mdo): 'am gang gis kyang 'jig rten du chos dang mthun par ma bskor ba'i/ tshangs pa'i 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba 'di ni bu mo de bzhin gshegs pa'i myi 'jigs pa dang po'o// bu mo gzhan yang byang chub seMs
312b1(mdo): dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ bar du gcod pa la bar du gcod pa'i chos su yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes te/ de bar du gcod pa'i chos la myi stond to// myi 'jug go// myi spyod do//
312b2(mdo): gzhan dag la yang myi 'chad do// myi stond to// bar du gcod pa'i chos shes nas spong ngo // de byang chub thob pa na seng ge'i sgra sgrog ste/ gang ngas bamu gcod pa'i chos su gsungs pa de dag la sten pa la ni bar
312b3(mdo): tu gcod pa ma yin no zhes bya ba'i gnas myed de/ 'dir bal kang yang rgol bar 'gyur ba zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin te/ 'di ni myi 'jigs pa gnyis pa'o// bu mo gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' byang chub
312b4(mdo): sems dpa'i khyad pa spyod pa na/ rtag tu rgyun myi 'chad par dkar po'i chos la mos pa yin te/ rnam par byang ba'i lam du zhugs shing / sems can thams cad la rnam par byang
312b5(mdo): dag pa'i chos ston te// yon tan kyi chos nyid mngon gsum du gyurd pa yin no// yan lag gi tshogs gang dag gis rnam/ par byang ba la/ rnam par dag pa'i lam gnod par 'gyur ba'i
312b6(mdo): yan lag gi tshogs de la bdag kyang spyod/ sems can gzhan la yang ston to// de byang chub thob pa na seng ge'i sgra sgrog ste/ gang ngas rnam par byang rnam par dag pa'i chos su gsungs pa
312b7(mdo): de dag la sten pa ni rnam par dag pa ma yin no// zhes bya ba'i gnas myed de/ 'di ring la su yang rgol bar 'gyur zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin te/ 'di ni myi 'jigs pa gsum pa'o// bu mo gzhan yang
312b8(mdo): byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i khyad pa spyod pa na/ bdag gis shes shing mthong gi/ gzhan gi myi shes myi mthong zhes mngon pa'i nga rgyal tu yang myi ltung ste// rtag tu rgyun myi chad par mngon
312b9(mdo): ba'i ba rgyal byed cing sdig pa byed pa blo sbyangs pa yin no// de chos kyi sbyin pa 'di dang ldan pas byang chub lob pa na/ seng ge'i sgra sgrog ste/ nga zag pa zad do// zhesu dam bcas pa la zag pa 'di lta bu zhig
313a1(mdo): yongs su ma zad do zhes bya ba de lta bu'i gnas myed de/ 'dir nga la su yang rgol bar 'gyur ba zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin te/ 'di ni myi 'jigs pa bzhi pa'o// bu mo gzhan yang byang chub seMs
313a2(mdo): dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ rtag tu rgyun myi 'chad par lam stor ba'i sems can rnams la/ lam mtshon par byed de/ lam gi gam yo nas mthon dman myi mnyam pa mnyam par byed do//
313a3(mdo): zam pa dang rdo stegs kyang 'dogs so// mtshan mo mun pa mun nag ki nang na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten la mar me yang 'bul lo// sems can ltung ba'i 'gyod pa la gnas pa rnams kyi ltung
313a4(mdo): ba'i 'gyod pa sel to// kun nas ldang ba myed par byed do// gzhan gi 'gyod pa myi bskyed do// gzhan ki ltung ba byung ba gleng bar myi byed do// chos la dogs pa skyed pa'i sems can rnams la
313a5(mdo): dogs pa thams cad gcad pa'i phyir ston te/ the tsom dang yid gnyis dang nem nur myed par byed do// chos kyi snang ba/ sgrub bo/ shes rab kyi snang ba chen po yang dag par skyed do//
313a6(mdo): sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / chos smra ba thams cad la chos bstan par gsol ba 'debs te/ chos ya bdag par 'dzind cing smra myed pas legs so zhes bya ba brjod
313a7(mdo): do// sems can gang la yang myi 'phya'o// snying slad myi byed do// chos la shed myi 'bye ba dang / snang ba dang / mgo myos pa dang rmongs par myi byed do// skye bo'i nges pa'i tshig la dbang za bar myi byed do//
313a8(mdo): tshig thams cad sangs rgyas kyi gsung du mos so// yi ge gsog dang / yi ge stong pa nyid kyis tshig tu brjod pa thams cad la skyon du lta ba mo yin no// 'khrul pa'i skabs myi tshol lo/ de chos yang dag par
313a9(mdo): blangs pa 'di dang ldan pas/ byang chub thob pa na/ 'khrul pa myed pa zhes ste/ dris pa thams cad lung bstan pa bston pa dag la de la de myed cing kun tu snang ba'i ting nge 'dzin de shin tu bsgoms pa'i phyir/ sgra skad
313b1(mdo): thams cad du 'jug pa'i gzungs las mkhas pas/ rtag tu rgyun myi chad par de bzhin gshegs pa 'khrul pa myed pa'i tshig gis chos ston pa yin te/ thams cad du phyed par lung stond pa 'di ni/ bu mo de bzhin gshegs
313b2(mdo): pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dang po'o// bu mo gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ tshig gi skyon thams cad spangs pa yin te/ bden pa smra chos smra don smra/ 'dul ba
313b3(mdo): smra zhing mu cor myi smra byung rgyal du myi smra ste/ 'phags pa ma yin gtam thams cad spangs nas/ 'phags pa'i myi smra ba thob cing dge sbyong gi chos kyi bya ba rtsod pa myed pa la zhugs te/ chos gang nyan cing yongs su
313b4(mdo): tshol ba dang / gzhan la yang ston pa de dag thams cad/ bdag dang gzhan dag zhi ba dang / nye bar zhi bar bya ba'i bsam pas yongs su tshol lo// rtsod pa myed par lhur len pa'i phyir de su dang yang
313b5(mdo): myi 'thab myi rtsod do// dgrar myi tshol lo// dgra myed pa'i chosal mos pa yin no// brjod du myed pa'i chos rnams la 'jug/ go// de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes lhun gyis grub pa la
313b6(mdo): mngon par dad do// sems can gzhan yang chos nyid 'di yang dag par 'dzind du 'jug go// de chos yang dag par blangs pa 'di dang ldan pas/ byang chub thob pa na caco myod pa zhes bya ste//
313b7(mdo): de ya de myed pa yin no// de yi ge 'bru gcig kyang myi brjod cing myi smra la/ sgra skad thams cad dang nges pa'i tshig gis bstan pa yang lhun gyis grub pa nyid du legs par bshad pas 'khor tshim par byed do// rnam
313b8(mdo): par 'phrul pa'i rgyal po ting nge 'dzin shin tu bsgoms pa dang / sgo mtha' yas pa bsgrub pa'i gzungs la mkhas pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas thams cad dang / mtshan thams cad dang / dpe' byad bzang
313b9(mdo): po thams cad dang / spu'i khung bu thams cad nas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi sgra dbyangs bsam gyis myi khyab pa 'byung ste/ tha na sgra gcig gis kyang 'khor thams cad kyi sems tshim par byed pa'i chos kyi sgo dpag tu myed pa
314a1(mdo): bstan pa 'byung zhing / sngon gi smon lam gyi byin gyi rlabs dang / ye shes kyi stobs kyis de na de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par rtog cing btang snyoms te/ lhun gyis grub pa 'di ni/ bu mo de bzhin gshegs
314a2(mdo): pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa gnyis pa'o// bu mo gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa dang / chos rjes su dran pa dang / dga'
314a3(mdo): 'dun rjes su dran pa dang / tshul khrims rjes su dran pa dang / gtong ba rjes su dran pa dang / lha rjes su dran pa'i dran po drug po dang / myi bral ba yin no// sems can gzhan yang rjes su dran pa 'di dag yang dag par
314a4(mdo): 'dzin du 'jug go// de chos yang dag par blangs pa 'di dang ldan pas/ byang chub thob pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa la bsnyel ba myed pa pa zhes bya ste/ de la de myed pa yin no// chos thams cad la dbang
314a5(mdo): sbyar ba'i ting nge 'dzin shin tu bsgoms pa dang / chos kyi sgron dma'i gzungs la mkhas pas rtag tu rgyun myi chad par de bzhin ka/ shegs pa bsnyel ba myed pa'i chos can yin no// gal te seMs
314a6(mdo): can thams cad kyis bskal par bsams te/ snga phyi myed par the com tri ba tha dad pa de bzhin gshegs pa la yongs su dris kyang de 'di bshad do// 'di stan to snyam tu myi sems myi rtog/ rtag tu ma
314a7(mdo): rmongs shing dran pa'i dbang pos smra skad zang gcig yud tsam gcig la logs par bshad pas sems can thams cad tshim par byed pa 'di ni/ bu mo de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa gsum
314a8(mdo): pa'o// bu mo gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ rtag tu rgyun myi chad par pha rold kyi sems srung ba'i yin te gzhan gi sems 'khrug pa myi byed/ sems la gdung bar myi
314a9(mdo): byed/ sems la dmyigs par myi byed/ dge ba'i rtsa ba'i bar du gcod par myi byed/ chos la dmyigs par myi byed cing / chos thams cad sbru ma lta bung mos te/ g.yo ba myed rlom sems myed cing / sems can thos
314b1(mdo): cad la sems snyoms pa yin/ chos mnyam pa nyid tu mthong ste/ chos kyi dbyings 'dres pa myed cing / ro gcig pa la zhugs pa yin no// de chos yang dag par blangs pa 'di dang ldan pas byang chub thob pa na/
314b2(mdo): sems bskyed pa gcig tsam yang mnyam par ma gzhag pa myed pa yin te/ chos thams cad rang bzhin gis mnyam pa nyid rnam par spros pa myed pa'i ting nge 'dzind shin tu bsgoms pa dang / kun nas 'khyil pa'i gzungs
314b3(mdo): la mkhas pas mnyam par gzhag cing lhun gyis grub pa'i tshul kIs/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa la 'jug pa 'di ni/ bu mo de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bzhi pa'o//
314b4(mdo): bu mo gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa' spyad pa spyod pa na/ phyin ci log gi 'du shes myed pa yin te/ sems phyin ci log myed/ lta ba phyin ci log myed/ myed pa la
314b5(mdo): sgro 'dogs pa'i phyin ci log myed pa yin/ bdag tu 'du shes pa ma yin/ sems can du 'du shes pa ma yin/ srog tu 'dra// shes pa ma yin/ gso bar 'du shes pa ma yin/ gang zag
314b6(mdo): du 'du shes pa ma yin/ shes las skyes par 'du shes pa ma yinashed pur 'du shes pa ma yin/ chad par 'du shes pa ma yin/ rtag par 'du shes pa ma yin/ 'byung bar 'du shes pa
314b7(mdo): ma yin/ 'jig par 'du shes pa ma yin/ dge ba dang myi dge ba dang / kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa dang / pha na ma tho ba myed pa dang / zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa myed pa dang / 'jig rten dang 'jig rten
314b8(mdo): las 'das pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba dang / 'khor ba dang / mya ngan las 'das pa la gnyis su 'du shes pa ma yin la/ 'du shes la chags shing zhen pa'i sems can rnams la 'du shes
314b9(mdo): phyin ci log spong bar ston kyang / che ba dang / tha dad pa'i 'dushes dang bral ba yin/ mthar lta ba thams cad rnam par spangs te/ dbu ma'i lam la zhugs pa yin/ chos mnyam pa nyid mthong ba yin no//
315a1(mdo): de chos yang dag par blangs pa 'di dang ldan pas/ byang chub thob pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa la tha dad pa'i 'du shes myed pa zhes bya ste/ de la de myed pa yin no// mtshan ma myed pa'i ting nge 'dzin
315a2(mdo): shin tu bsgoms pa dang / myi zad pa'i za ma tog gi bzungs la mkhas pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan ma myed pa'i gnas la gnas kyang / mtshan ma thams cad la 'du shes kyis 'dzind pa dang / rnam par rtog
315a3(mdo): pa la pyod pa'i sems can rnams la snying rje chen po myi ldog ste/ sems can 'dul ba'i dus la yang nub cing rmo stond pa'i rgyun yang myi gcod pa 'di ni bu mo de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa lnga
315a4(mdo): pa'o// bu mo gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa nA/ rtag tu rgyun myi chad par btang snyoms pa yin te/ 'khor ba'i na spyod pa'i nyon mongs shing / sdug bsngal ba'i
315a5(mdo): chos thams cad la btang snyoms pas/ bde ba dang yid bde ba/ thams cad kyi gnas kyi chos la rjes su 'chags pa yang myed/ sdug bsngal dang / yid myi bde ba'i gnas kyi chos thams cad
315a6(mdo): la khor khro ba yang myed/ rjes su chags pa dang / khong khro ba dang / bral bas/ don thams cad rnyed cing 'byor da kyang khengs par myi 'gyur/ don thams cad yongs su nyams kyang dud par myi 'gyur gyi/
315a7(mdo): 'du byed thams cad la myi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal bar so sor rtog cing / bdag myed pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa ni zhi ba'o zhes mos te/ btang snyoms pa yin no// sems can gzhan yang btang snyoms kyi
315a8(mdo): kyi chos nyid de lta bu yang dag par 'dzind du 'jug go// de chos yang dag par blangs pa 'di dang ldan pas/ byang chub thob pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa la ma brtags pa'i btang snyoms myed pa zhes bya ste/ de la
315a9(mdo): btang snyoms de myed pa yin no// gnyis las chags pa las rnam par grol ba'i ting 'dzin shin tu bsgoms pa dang / rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya'i gzungs la mkhas pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa lnga dang / klu dang / gnod/
315b1(mdo): sbyin dang / dri ba dang / l+h+wa ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / myi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba dang / myi dang myi ma yin pa thams cad kyis bstod cing /
315b2(mdo): sti stang byas te/ mchod cing ri mor byas kyang rjes su chags pa myed/ bdud dang gzhan mu stegs can dang / phas kyi rgol ba dang / 'tshe ba can gi sems cad thams cad kyis dkrugs shing gnod par byas kyang / khor
315b3(mdo): phro ba myed la/ sems mtshungs shing mnyam pa yin te/ phan 'dogs pa dang // gnod par byas pa la sa dang mtshungs pa'i sems dang / chu dang mtshungs pa'i sems dang / me dang mtshungs pa'i sems dang /
315b4(mdo): rlub dang mtshungs pa'i sems kyis khengs par myi 'gyur/ dud pa ra myi 'gyur zhing myi 'khrugs te/ nam mkha' dang mtshuras pa'i sems kyis mnyam pa nyid du sbyor zhing / sems can
315b5(mdo): thams cad la btang snyoms par gnas pa yin no// de chos nges par sems dpa'i btang snyoms pa 'di dang ldan pas/ sems can thams cad la snying rje chen po myi ldog ste/ sems
315b6(mdo): can 'dul ba'i dus la yang nub cing ci rigs par/ chos ston pa'i rgyun yang myi gcod pa 'di ni/ bu mo de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa drug pa'o// bu mo gzhan yang byang chub
315b7(mdo): sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na// rtag tu rgyun myi chad par mos draka pa yin te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yongs su tshol ba la mos pa rlabs po che dang / mos pa chen po dang /
315b8(mdo): mos pa zab mos dge ba'i rtsa ba sna tsho gos bskrun par mos so// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa yongs su spong bar mos so// theg pa chen po las phyir myi ldog par mos so// sems
315b9(mdo): can thams cad la snying rje chen po btang ba yid la byed pa myi 'dor bar mos so// rang gis rtog cing sgrub kyi// gzhan gyi tring la myi 'jog par sangs rgyas kyi chos yang dge bar bsgrub par mos te/
316a1(mdo): bdud dang gzhan mu stegs can dmyigs pa can lta ba la mngon par zhen pa/ thams cad dang / sems can thams cad kyis de mos pa de las mos pa dang bral bar myi nus so// de chos yang
316a2(mdo): ba dag par blangs pa 'di dang ldan pas/ byang chub thob pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa mos pa nyam pa myed pa zhes bya ste/ de la de myed pa yin no// mos pa'i ti nge 'dzin 'du byed kyi ting nge 'dzin shin
316a3(mdo): tu bsgoms pa dang / rdo rje rgyal mtshan gyi gzungs la mkhas pas dbang bskur ba'i phyir chos thams cad kyi nang nas bstan par bya ba de ston to// kar du skad cig zang cig yud tsam gyis dus kang dang /
316a4(mdo): nyi tshod kar dang / yul yang gzhan gang dang / sems can gi sems kyi klud kaka dang / gangal snod ji lta ba bzhin du ci rigs par chos bstond kyang mnyam par bzhag pa'i gnas
316a5(mdo): kyang myi 'dor ba 'di ni/ bu mo de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bdun pa'o// bu mo// gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa
316a6(mdo): gyod pa na rtag tu rgyun myi chad par brtson 'grus brtsams pa yin te/ rtag tu brtson pa myi 'dor/ dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par sgrub cing sbyor bas ngoms myi myong / byin gyi brlabs
316a7(mdo): pa'i brtson pa la rtul cing bla ma la dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang / chos smra ba dang / sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi gan du 'gro la/ yongs su 'dri ba dang / bsnyen
316a8(mdo): bkur bya ba dang / mchod pa'i las dang / bskal pa tshad myed par 'khor ba yongs su gzung bar bya ba dang / sems can tshad myed pa yongs su sbyin par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad myed pa
316a9(mdo): yongs su sbyang ba dang / sangs rgyas tshad myed pa la mchod cing rim gro bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad myed pa yang dag par gzung ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad myed pa mngon par rdzogs par
316b1(mdo): byang chub par bya ba dang / sems can gyi spyod pa tshad myed pa la 'jug par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad myed pa bstan pa la mkhas par bya ba'i phyir/ de brtson 'grus de tshad myed par byas pa yin no//
316b2(mdo): de chos yang dag par blangs pa 'di dang ldan pas/ byang chub thob pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa la brtson 'grus nyams pa myed pa zhes bya ste/ de la de myed pa yin no// brtson 'grus kyi ting nge 'dzin
316b3(mdo): 'du byed kyi ting nge 'dzin pa shinang tu bsgoms pas sems can tshad myed pa gzung cing 'dul ba'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul gyis/ rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul rnam par 'phrul
316b4(mdo): gakhyu mchog tu gyur pa/ tshad myed pa stond kyang de'i rdzu 'phru la de chags pa myed/ sgrib pa myed pa/ thogs pa myed par sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du 'gro ste/ mngon par
316b5(mdo): phyogs kyang mngon par 'du byed pa myed cing thams cad du rgyu ba nam/ mkhas klas pa 'di ni/ bu mo de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad pa'o// bu mo gzhan
316b6(mdo): yang byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ rtag tu rgyun myi chad par dran pa/ phun sum tshogs shing dran pa shes bzhin mchog dang ldan pa yin te/ de'i dran pa de brjed
316b7(mdo): pa myed pa yin/ 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos thams cad la dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bsgom pa'i rnal 'byor de la brtson pa yin no// de nang gi lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas te/ myi rtag
316b8(mdo): ba dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag myed pa dang / myi sdug pa'i rnam pa yid la byed cing sbyor ro// phyi'i lus dang / phyi nang gi lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas te/ myi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba
316b9(mdo): dang / bdag myed pa dang / myi sdug pa'i rnam par yid la byed cing sbyor ro// nang gi tshor ba rnams la tshor ba'i rjes su lta zhing gnas te/ stong pa'i rnam par yid la byed cing sbyor ro// de bzhin du phyi'i
317a1(mdo): tshor ba dang phyi nang gi tshor ba rnams la tshor ba'i rjes su lta zhing gnas te/ stong pa'i rnam par yid la byed cing sbyor ro// nang gi sems la sems kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas te/ mtshan ma
317a2(mdo): myed pa'i rnam par yid la byed cing sbyor ro// phyi'i sems dang phyi nang gi sems la sems kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas te/ mtshan ma myed pa'i rnam par yid la byed cing sbyor ro// nang gi chos rnams la
317a3(mdo): chos kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas te/ smon pa myed pa'i rnam par yid la byed cing sbyor ro// phyi'i chos dang / phyi nang gi chos rnams la chos kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas te/ smon pa myed pa'i rnam par yid
317a4(mdo): la byed cing sbyor ro// lus la zhugs pa'i dran pa nye bar ga zhag pa bsgom ste/ myi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag myed pa dang / mya sdug pa'i rnam par yid la
317a5(mdo): byed cing sbyor yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku yongs su bsgrub pa'i phyir/ lus kyi las legs par sbyor ba'i rgyun kyangamyi gcod do// tshor ba la zhugs pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag
317a6(mdo): pasgom ste/ stong pa'i rnam par yid la byed cing sbyor yang / ngan song thams cad tu skyes pa'i sems can rnams la lta bas sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba thams cad chun gcad pa'i phyir/ sems can de dag la
317a7(mdo): snying rje chen po'i rgyun yang myi gcod do// sems la zhugs pa'i dran pa nye bar bzhag pa sgom ste/ mtshan ma myed pa'i rnam par yid la byed cing sbyor yang / byang chub kyi sems kyang myi brjed la/ theg pa chen
317a8(mdo): po'i tshogs yang dag par sgrub pa'i rgyun yang myi gcod do// chos la zhugs pa'i dran pa nye bar bzhag pa sgom ste/ smon pa myed pa'i rnam par yid la byed cing sbyor yang / 'dod chags dang bral ba'i chos
317b1(mdo): nyid kyang mngon sum du myi byed la/ sangs rgyas kyi chos dang yang 'tsham pa yin te/ chos kyi dbyings mtha' dang / dpur myed pa la yang dag par 'jug go// de chos yang dag par blangs pa 'di dang ldan pas/
317b2(mdo): byang chub thob pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa la dran pa nyams pa myed pa zhes bya ste/ de la de myed pa yin no// spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzind shin tu bsgoms pas/ de bzhin
317b3(mdo): gshegs pa kun bstan pa'i cho 'phrul gyis/ sems can thams cad kyi sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' dang / da ltar byung ba'i sems gcig nas gcig tu rgyud pa dang / dbang po dang /
317b4(mdo): khams dang / mos pa gcig nas gcig tu rgyud pa dang / nyon mongs pa spyod pa'i bag chags dang / bsam pa dang / bka la nyal dang / kun nas bkres pa dang /
317b5(mdo): dge ba dang / myi dge ba'i las kyi rnam par smin pa ka cin/ nas gcig tu rgyud pa dang / tshe dang 'chi 'pho dang / skye ba gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa dang / bskal pa dang zhing
317b6(mdo): du sangs rgyas gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa dang / nyan thos 'dus pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i pyod pa lung bstan pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa dang / pha ma dang / nye du dang / snag gi
317b7(mdo): gnyen mtshams gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa bstan pa la dran pa'i dbang po thogs pa myed cing / rmongs pa myed pa yin te/ thams cad du phyed pa lung ston pa 'di ni/ bu mo de bzhin gshegs
317b8(mdo): pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dgu pa'o// bu mo gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ rtag tu rgyun myi chad par shes rab spyod pa yin te/ shes rab kyi 'od
317b9(mdo): dang / shes rab kyi snang ba dngape / shes rab kyi dpyod pa dang / shes rab kyi dbang dang / rno ba'i shes rab dang / zab pa'i shes rab dang / nges par rtogs pa'i shes rab dang / myi thul
318a1(mdo): ba'i shes rab dang / zil kyis myi non pa'i shes rab dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis gting dpag dka' ba'i shes rab dang / yangs shing rgya che la sems snyoms pa'i shes rab
318a2(mdo): dang / shes rab lhag pa'i shes rab dang / bdag tshul bzhin yid la byed kyi lung mnos pa myed pa'i shes rab dang / zos pa tshol bas ngoms myi myong ba'i shes rab can te/ zos kyang shes rab kyis khong du chud cing rtogs
318a3(mdo): te/ 'gro'i thod la me 'bar ba bzhin du sti stang du byed cing thos pa tshol la/ zos pa snying por byed pa yin/ zos pa bstsags pa yin/ chos 'dod cing chos la dka' bas dga' mos pa yin
318a4(mdo): dam pa'i chos yongs su tshol ba la rtson pa yin te/ de chos 'dod pa des phyi nang gi dngos po kar yang yongs su mya gtong ba myed do// bla de bla ma la rim gro bya ba myi byed pa gang yang
318a5(mdo): myed do// de sdug bsngal gyi phung po myi bzod pa gang yang myed// do// de badra ba'i yo byad myi 'dor ba gang yang myed do// de chos 'dod pa des tshigs bzhi pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gcig
318a6(mdo): nyan pa la shin tu dga' ba yin te/ stong gsum gi stong chen po'i 'jig rten ka khams rin po ches yongs su bkang ba la ni ma yin no// chos kyi tshig gcig la shin tu dka' ba yin te/
318a7(mdo): 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po thob pa la ni ma yin no// pha rol tu phyind pa'i lam nyan pa la shin tu dka' ba yin te// brgya byin dang tshangs pa thob pa la ni ma yin no// tshigs bzhi pa'i tshogs su
318a8(mdo): bcad pa gcig gzhan dag la ston par byed pa yi ni shind du dka' ba yin te/ kang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi gtan pa myed pa'i mchod sbyin byed pa la ni ma yin no// gzhan dag byang chub kyi sems yang
318a9(mdo): dag par 'dzinang du 'dug pa la shi nad tu dga' ba yin te/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed zab pa la ma yin no// gzhan dag la pha rol tu phyind pa dang /
318b1(mdo): rab tu ldan pa'i chos kyi gtam rab tu ston pa la ston pa yin te/ brgya byin dang tshangs pa'i gang ka'i klung gi bye ma snyed thob pa la ni ma yin no// de lhag pa'i bsam pa de lta bu la zhugs pas sti stang byed
318b2(mdo): cing chos nyan to// sti stang byed cing gzhan la stonod to// de de ltar mngon par brtson pas tshogs chu drang lhas yongs su bzung ba yin/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis dgongs pa yin no// de ltas
318b3(mdo): yongs su bzung zhing sangs rgyas kyis dgongs pas/ 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i gtsug lag thams cad bdag nyid la mngon gsum du 'gyur ba yin no// de shes rab kyi snang
318b4(mdo): ba'i sgo zad myi shes pas snang ba yang yin no// de chos snang ba'i sgro 'di dang ldan pas byang chub thob pa nA/ de ba zhin gshegs pa la shes rab nyams pa myed pa zhes bya ste/
318b5(mdo): de la de myed pa yin no// sems can thams cad kyi sem// sa kyi spyod pa shes pa dang / dge ba dang / mya dge ba/ dang / lung du stand pa dang / yung du ma bstand pa dang /
318b6(mdo): kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa dang / kha na ma tho ba myed pa dang / zag pa dang bcos pa dang / zag pa myed pa dang / 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa dang
318b7(mdo): rnam par byang ba dang / 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa dang / chos kyi sgo thams cad khong du chud cing rtogs pastan pa shes pa dang / zhing thams cad kyi rdul phra rab thams cad dang / mnyam pa'i bskal pa snyan pa shes
318b8(mdo): ba dag la/ de'i shes rab de bogs pa myed cing sgrib pa myed pa yin no// de'i shes rab de sngon gi mtha' dang / b+hi ma'i mtha' dang / da ltar byung ba'i dus la chags pa myed cing sgrib pa myed de/ bogs pa myed do//
318b9(mdo): phyi ma'i mthar de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnams la bstan kyang thug pa myed do// dpyod pa'i 'du byed kyi ting nge 'dzind shin tu bsgoms pas rjes su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul gyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi sgo gcig
319a1(mdo): las chos kyi sgo thams cad snang zhing / chos kyi sgo thams cad chos kyi sgo gcig gis yang dag par sgrub pa 'di ni/ bu mo de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcu pa'o// bu mo/
319a2(mdo): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i myad pa pyod pa na/ rtag tu rgyun myi 'chad par khyim gyi gnas don tu myi gnyer ba yin/ 'dod pa don tu myi gnyer ba yin te/ de khyim nas byung bar dgal zhing rab tu
319a3(mdo): 'byung ba mang ba yin/ dben pa la gzhol/ dben pa la 'bab/ dben pa la 'bab cing chos zab mo bsgom pa'i rnal 'byor de la brtson te/ de stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa dang / na par
319a4(mdo): tha rad pa'i sgo gsum po 'di dag sgom mo// gang phas kyi rgol ba tham sa cad kyi yul ma yin zhing myi rtogs pa dang / dmyigs par lta ba/ mtshan ma la mngon par dga' ba thams cad kyis rtogs par myi 'gyu
319a5(mdo): ba'i rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo gsum po de dag bsgoms pas/ sgrib pa myed pa zhes bya ba'i rnam par tha rad pa kun tu skye'o// chags/ pa myed pa'i shes rab kyi snang ba yang rab tu 'thob po/ bdud kyi
319a6(mdo): sul las kyang shi nad tu 'da'o// ye shes kyi yul yang yongs su rdzogs par byed do// sgrib pa dang / chod pa dang / kun nas dkris pa dang / lta ba dang / nyon mongs pa dang / mtshan ma thams
319a7(mdo): cad la mya spyod do// do sgrub pa myed pa'i rnam par tha rad pa rab tu thob cing / rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo gsum la rnam par rtsen pas/ chos zab mo stond pa yin no// don la rton pa yin gi/ tshig 'bru la rton pa ma yin no//
319a8(mdo): ye shes la rton pa yin gyi/ rnam par shes pa la rton pa ma yin no/ nges pa'i don la rton pa yin gyi/ drang ba'i don la rton pa ma yin no// chos nyid la rton po yin gyi/ gang zag la rton pa ma yin no// sems can
319a9(mdo): thams cad kyi rten du gyur pa yin te/ yi ge dang rnam par rtog pa la chags zhen pa la don la rton pa bstan nas yongs su tha rang par byed do// rnam par shes pa'i mtshan ma la chags zhen pa la/ ye shes la rton pa bstan nas
319b1(mdo): yongs su tha rad par byed do// drang bar sgro btags pa la chags zhen pa la nges pa'i don la rton pa bstan nas yongs su tha rad par byed do// gang zag la mngon par zhen cing chags zhen pa la/ chos nyid la rton pa bstan nas
319b2(mdo): yongs su tha rad par byed do// lta bar song ba drug bcu rtsa gnyis la chags zhen pa la/ stong pa nyid bstan nas yongs su tha dad par byed do// rnam par rtog pa'i sgrib pa thams cad la chags zhen pa la mtshan ma myed pa
319b3(mdo): bstan nas yongs su tha dad par byed do// khams gsum la chags zhen pa la smon pa myed pa bstan nas yongs su tha rad par byed do// 'dod chags kyis chags zhe nad pa la myi sdug pa'i rnam pa bstan nas yongs su
319b4(mdo): tha dad par byed do// zhe sdang myong ba chags zhes pa sa byams pa bstan nas yongs su thard par byed do// gti mug dpyod pa la chags zhen pa la rtend cing 'brel par 'byung ba bstan nas yongs su tha ra
319b5(mdo): par byed do// ser sna la chags zhen pa la sbyin pa'i pha rol tu/ phyind pa bstan nas yongs su tha rad par byed do// ngan pa'i ngang tshul/ la chags zhen pa la/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bstan
319b6(mdo): nas yongs su tha rad par byed do// gnod sems la chags zhen pa la bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa bstan nas yongs su tha rad par byed do// la lo la chags zhen pa la brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa/ bstan
319b7(mdo): nas yongs su la rang par byed do// g.yeng ba la chags zhen pa la bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyinang pa bstan nas yongs su tha dad par byed do// 'chal pa'i shes rab la chags zhen pa la shes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyin/
319b8(mdo): pa bstan nas yongs su ba rang par byed do// so so'i skye bo'i sa la chags zhen pa la 'phags pa'i bdan pa bstan nas yongs su tha rad par byed do// phyin ci log lnga chags zhen pA la/ myi rtag pa dang sdug bsngal ba
319b9(mdo): dang / bdag myed pa dang / zhi ba bstan nas yongs su ba rad par byed do// sgrub pa dang chod pa dang / kun nas kris pa dang / lta ba thams cad la chags zhen pa la slob pa myed pa'i rnam par bdad pa bstan nas yongs
320a1(mdo): su tha rad par byed do// nyon mongs pa thams cad la chags zhe nad pa la byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos bstan nas yongs su tha dad par byed do// de chos yang dag par blangs pa 'di dang ldan pas/ byang chub thos
320a2(mdo): pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa la rnam par grol ba myed pa zhes bya ste/ de la de myed pa yin no// de'i rnam par grol ba de myi 'khrugs shing shin tu mthar zug ste dpa' rlabs myed la shi nad tu bsal ba'i dngos por gyur cing zab ste/
320a3(mdo): nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis gting dpag dka' ba yin/ sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam pa nyid kyi rjes su song ba yin/ dri ma myed cing dri ma dang bral te/ rnyog pa myed pa la sha nad tu yongs su dag pa
320a4(mdo): yin/ zhi gnas dang lhag mthong rnams la shin tu yongs su sbyang ba/ byas pas zad myi shes pa yin// bstan pa mtha' yas mu myed pa/ yin/ chags pa myed cing sgrib pa myed pa yin/ nam mkha'i dbyings
320a5(mdo): su yang dag par 'du ba yin te/ dri ma myed pa'i snying po'i ting nge 'dzin da shi nad tu bsgoms pa dang / chos thams cad snang ba dang / ldan pa'i gzungs la mkhas pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams
320a6(mdo): cad kyis rnam par grol po'i mtshan kyi chos bstand pa dang / rgyu mthu na pa yin te/ thams cad las byung zhing chos thams cad kyi snang ba dang ldan pa yin/ mya ngan las 'das pa la gzhol ba yin/ mya
320a7(mdo): ngan las 'das pa la 'bab pa yin/ mya ngan las 'das pa la bab pa yin te/ shi nad tu mthar zug cing mthar phyi nad pa 'di ni/ bu mo de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcu gcig pa'o//
320a8(mdo): bu mo gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa gyod pa na/ ye shes lhur len pa yin te/ ye shes kyi stobs dang / ye shes la 'bab pa dang / ye shes kyi byin dang ldan pa yin no// de'i ye
320a9(mdo): ge de ni nyams pa myed par 'gro ba'i mngon par shes pa yongs su sbyang ba byas pa las nges par byung ba'o// thams cad mkhyend pa'i ye shes kyis rnam par dpyod pa'i blo dang ldan pa yin te/ thams cad mkhyend pa'i
320b1(mdo): ye shes kyis rnam par spyad pa'i blo dang ldan pas/ 'dod chags dang bcas pa'i sems la yang / 'dod chags dang bcas pa'i sems su yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sems//
320b2(mdo): la yang / 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sems su yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// de bzhin du zhe sdang dang bcas pa dang / zhe sdang myed pa dang / gti mug dang bcas pa dang / gti mug myed pa dang / nyon mongs
320b3(mdo): pa dang / bcas pa dang / nyon mongs pa myed pa dang / 'khor byang dang bcas pa dang / 'khor byed myed pa dang / zang zing dang bcas pa dang / bang zing myed pa dang mchog tu 'dzin pa dang / mchog tu 'dzind pa myed pa dang /
320b4(mdo): bla ma dang bcas pa dang / bla ma myed pa dang / sleb pa dang bcas/ dpa dang / sgrib pa myed pa dang / sung bstan pa dang / sung ma bstanapar pa dang / dge ba dang / mye dgu pa dang / kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa
320b5(mdo): dang / kha na mtho ba myed pa dang / zag pa dang bcas pa dang // zag pa myed pa dang / 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'ad// sa pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa can dang / kun nas nyon
320b6(mdo): mongs pa can ma yin pa dang / rnam par dag pa dang / rnam par ma dag pa dang / chu ru dang / cher gyur da pa dang / mtha' dang bcas pa dang / mtha' yas pa dang / ser sna dang ldan pa dang / gtong ba
320b7(mdo): dang ldan pa dang / ngang tshul ngan pa'i sems dang / tshul khrims la sbyor ba'i sems dang / gnod sems kyi bka la nyal dang / gnod sems myed pa dang / le lo dang / brtson 'grus dang / ldan pa dang / g.yeng
320b8(mdo): ba dang / mnyam par gzhag pa dang / 'chal pa'i shes rab dang / shes rab dang ldan pa dang / so so'i skye bo'i sems dang / log pa nyid du nges pa dang / yang dag pa nyid du nges pa dang / nyan thos kyi theg pa
320b9(mdo): nges pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg par nges pa dang / theg pa chen por nges pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// 'di ni sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa'o zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab
321a1(mdo): tu shes so// 'di ni sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba/ 'di ni sdug bsngal 'gog pa/ 'di ni sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam mo zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// myi skye ba shes/
321a2(mdo): pas sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa rab tu shes so// shi nad tu kun tu myi rgyu ba shes pas kun 'byung ba rab tu shes so// chad pa myed cing rtag pa myed pa sha nad tu skad cig pa 'gog pa shes pas 'gog pa rab tu shes
321a3(mdo): so// thams cad kyi rjes su song ba nam mkha' yang dag par 'du ba/ bdag gi bya ba myed cing yongasasu 'dzin pa myed pa/ shi nad tu rnam par dag pa'i shes pas lam rab tu shes so// de 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po
321a4(mdo): 'di dag de ltar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes kyang / sems can yongs su smyind par bya ba'i phyir/ mngon gsum du yang myi bye/ da la/ bden pa yongs su shes pa dang / spang ba dang / bsgom pa
321a5(mdo): dang / mngon gsum du bya ba'i phyir/ sems can rnams la chos stond to// de'i chos bstand pa de bden pa'i rjes su 'thun ba yin/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang / 'gal ba myed pa
321a6(mdo): yin/ mthar lta ba thams cad yongs su spangs pa yin/ dbu ma'i lam la zhugs pa'i yin/ rten pa'i chos mngon gsum du gyurd pa yin te/ de chos thams cad rgyu dang bcas shing / rkyen dang bcas
321a7(mdo): po'i kha na las kyi/ bdag gi kha na las pa ma yin sems can kyi khan las pa ma yin/ srog gi kha na las pa ma yin/ gso ba'i kha na las pa ma yin/ skyes bu'i kha na las pa ma yin/ gang zag gi kha na las pa ma yin/
321a8(mdo): par rab tu shes so// de ma rig pa'i rkyen kyis 'du byed rnams su rab tu shes pa dang / 'du byed kyi rkyen kyis rnam par shes pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i rkyen kyis mying dang gzugs mying dang gzugs kyi rkyen kyis skye mched drug
321a9(mdo): skye mched drug gi rkyen kyis reg pa dang / reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dang / tshor ba'i rkyen kyis sred pa dang / sred pa'i rkyen kyis len pa dang / le nad pa'i rkyen kyis srid pa dang / srid pa'i rkyen kyis skye ba dang / skye ba'i rkyen kyis rga
321b1(mdo): shi dang / mya ngan dang smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid myi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa rnams 'byung ste/ de ltar na sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po ma 'dres pa 'di 'byung bar 'gyur bar rab tu shes so// de ma rig pa'i//
321b2(mdo): 'gag panas gzhi 'gag pa'i bar dang / de ltar stug bsngal gyi phung po chen po ma 'dres pa 'di 'gag par 'gyur bar rab tu shes so// de 'di la yang dag par slob pa na/ gang ma rig pa'i rkyem las byung ba de ni/ bdag gi sbyin sa
321b3(mdo): byung ba ma yin/ sems cad kyi rkyen las byung ba ma yin/ sog dang / gsol dang / gang zag gi rkyen las byung ba ma yin no// gang bdag gi rkyen las byung ba ma yin pa nas/ gang zag gi rkyen las byung ba ma yin pa
321b4(mdo): bar de ni stong pa'o// stong pa gang yin pa de ni chad pa ma yin rtag pa ma yin no// chad pa ma yin rtag pa ma yin pa gang yin pa de ni gdod ma nyid nas ma skyes ma byung ba'o// gdod ma nyid nas ma skyes ma byung ba gang
321b5(mdo): yin pa de'i dus gsum du bajod du myed pa'o// dus gsum du brjo du myed pa gang yin pa de ni/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid do// / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid gapa yin pa de bgrang ba myed cing ba
321b6(mdo): ba las gnad tu 'das pa'o// bgrang ba myed cing bgrang ba las shin tu 'das pa gang yin pa de ni dod dam pa'o// dod dam pa gangs ba de sangs rgyas kyi bkal yang dag pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi bkra
321b7(mdo): yang dag pa gang yin pa de 'bab pa myed cing rtsod pa myed pa'o// 'bab pa myed cing rtsod pa myed pa gang yin pa de dge sbyong gi chos so// gang dge sbyong gi chos gang yin pa de nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i rang bzhin du des de
321b8(mdo): ltar shes shing gnas te/ tshul bzhin ma yin pa/ kun 'byung bas ma rig pa/ kun 'byung ba rab tu shes so// mo rig pa 'gag pa nas rga shi 'gag pa'i bar du rab tu shes te/ rgyu dang rkyen tshogs pa'i shes pas/
321b9(mdo): chad par lta bar spyor pa ma yin gyi bdag myed pa dang / sems cad myed pa dang / srog byed pa dang / gang bag myed pa'i chos kyi rjes su song ba yin te/ mtha' khas kyi sen/ nye bar gyi 'jed/ myi dmyigs pas so//
322a1(mdo): mtha' myi dmyigs pas/ dbus yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ngo // chos gang mi mtha' myi dmyigs pa de la dbus yod par ga la 'gyur te/ de'i mtha' ci 'dra ba zhig snyam nas/ de mtha' dang dbus myed
322a2(mdo): pa'i chos rnams la 'jug go// chos kyi dbyings mtha' dang / dpung dang bral bas/ mtha' dang dpung myed pa'i chos stond pa yin no// de chos yang dag par blangs pa 'di dang ldan pas/ byang chub thob pa na/ de bzhin gshes
322a3(mdo): pa la rnam par gros pa/ ye shes mthong ba/ nyams myed pa zhes bya ste de la de myed pa yin no// stobs bkod pa'i ting nge 'dzin da sha nad tu bsgoms pa dang / mtha' yas 'khyil pa'i gzungs la mkhas pas// de'i
322a4(mdo): rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba/ mthong ba de chos kyi dbyings mtha' dang dpung myed par 'du ba ni yin/ gnas dang gnas ma yin/ ba bstan pa rnams la/ nam mkha'i dbyings ltar rgya che zhing rnam par/
322a5(mdo): myi rtog la/ lhan kyis grub pa yin/ 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs// pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i las yang dag par blangs pa shes pa/ bstand pa rnams la rnam par sman pa chud myi za bar ston pa yin/
322a6(mdo): sems can thams cad kyi dbang po dang / brtson 'grus kyi rim pa shes pa bstand pa rnams la mngon gsum du gyur pa yin/ khams du ma dang / khams sna tshogs pa la 'jig rten bstand pa dzas la zhen
322a7(mdo): tu rnam par gdon myi za bar stond pa yin/ mos pa du ma dang / mos pa sna tshogs shes pa bstand pa rnams la myi zad par stond cing 'jug pa yin/ kun tu 'gro ba'i lam shes pa bstand pa rnams la phyogs kyi dra ba
322a8(mdo): thams cad rnam par dbye ba rgyas par byed cing phyed par lung stonod pa yin// bsam gtan dang / rnam par tha rad pa dang / ting nge 'dzind dang / snyoms par 'jug pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba
322a9(mdo): dang / ldang ba shes pa bstand pa rnams la/ chos kyi sgo bsam gyis myi khyab pa/ rnam par gzhag pa ston pa yin/ sngon gnas pa rnam pa du ma rjes su dran pa shes pa bstan pa rnams la/ sems can thams cad kyi
322b1(mdo): 'chi 'pho ba dang / tshe dang skye ba rab 'brang tha ma/ thog ma'i mthar chags pa myed cing sgrib pa myed pa'i ye shes stond pa yin/ thogs pa myed cing sgrib pa myed pa'i lha'i myika shes pa bstand pa rnams la/ kun tu rnam par/
322b2(mdo): lta ba thams cad du shi nad tu yongs su sbyangs pa'i lung bstand pa stond pa yin/ zag pa thams cad zad pa shes pa bstan pa rnams la/ bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba ma lus par spang ba shes pa stond pa yin/
322b3(mdo): myi 'jigs pa shes pa bstand pa rnams la/ zil kyis myi non pa stond pa yin/ snying rje chen po'i stobs shes pa bstan pa rnams la sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa thams cad du tha dad du bya ba myed cing / sbyor ba mtshungs mnya
322b4(mdo): ba rgyun myi gcod pa stond pa yin/ so so ci rigs par chos bstan pa rnams la/ lhun kyis grub pa'i ye shes kyis rnam par 'phrul pa stond pa yin/ sems can thams cad yongs su smyind par byed cing 'dul ba'i
322b5(mdo): phyir myi zad pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba'i ye shes kyi yul bstand pa rnams la zab mo dang / sna tshogs dang / thugs dang / snrel zhir rgyu ba dang / shes rab dang / zabs dang / stobs dang / rnam
322b6(mdo): par 'phrul ba'i ye shes stond pa yin/ nyan thos dang / rangs ngas rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma yin pa yin te/ bu mo 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcu gnyis
322b7(mdo): pa'o// bu mo gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ ye shes kyis byas pa'i las rnams byed kyi/ nga rgyal gyis byas pa rnams myi byed de/ de ye shes kyis lus kyi las byed pa ni
322b8(mdo): 'di lta ste/ 'khu ba dang / g.yo ba dang / gya kyu dang / tshul 'chos pa thams cad myi byed do// sdang ba myed cing chags pa myed pa yid/ rtag tu tshangs par spyod cing de lus kyi las kyi brtson 'grus brtsams pas byang chub
322b9(mdo): dang 'thun te/ bdag dang gzhan la gnod pa myi byed pa yin/ pha rol tu phyind pa'i rgyu mthun pa snying rje chen po la sbyor zhing / rtag tu sems can kyi don la brtson te/ lus kyi las de lta bu dang ldan pa yin no// de chos yang /
323a1(mdo): / sa kyi pa na d+mo nga/ skyes su na sa/ 'gyud//
323a2(mdo): thams cad kun tu ston pa'i ting nge 'dzin da shi nang tu bsgoms pa dang / kun nas snang ba'i gzungs la mkhas pas de bzhin gshegs pa kha dog du mA dang / kha dog sna tshogs dang / gzugs dang / dbyibs dang / chu
323a3(mdo): zheng ston pa'i lus kyis/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dra ba dang / lA ma yin dang / nam mkhal lding dang / myi 'am ci dang / sto 'phye chen po dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jog rten skyong bar
323a4(mdo): bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / rnge'u rigs dang / dmang rigs dang / dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma dang / srog chags brgya stong du ma lhags pa'i 'khor 'dus pa
323a5(mdo): thams cad du spyod lam tshad myed pa dang / kha dog dang / rtags/ dang / dbyibs gnas pa/ mchog dam pa/ gtso bo gya nom pa/ li lus bstan nas/ thams cad dang ldan pal 'khor la chos
323a6(mdo): kyi gtam kun tu ston to// yang dag par 'dzind tu 'jug go// gzengs bstod do// rab tu dka' bar byed do// kun tu bstan pa yang dag par 'dzin tu bcug/ gzengs bstod/ rab tu dag
323a7(mdo): bar byas nas/ myi snang bar byed do// myi bar gyur kyang song bar shes pa yang myed do// 'khor 'dus pa de dag du 'dus shing 'dug ste/ smra'am cang myi smra yang rung 'ongs par shes pa yang myed do// de la lta bsku
323a8(mdo): kyang ngoms myi myong ngo // des bstand pa la dka' ba dang / mchog tu dka' ba rab tu rgya chen po yang rnyed do// 'dod pa la dga' zhing rtse ba dang / yul dang longs spyod thams cad la myi lta ba yid la byed cing sbyor ro//
323a9(mdo): sdang bar gyur nga na lta ba dang / mnyan pa'i phyir sgom par 'gyur ro// de la sta bas skom pa dang / sta 'dod pa dang / chos nyan pas skom pa dang / chos nyan par 'dod pa de yang / bag pa myed pa'i lus kyi las dpa/
323b1(mdo): ngag gi las dang / yid kyi las 'thob pa'i rgyur 'gyur te// bu mo 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcu gsum pa'o// bu mo gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i
323b2(mdo): spyad pa pyod pa na/ ye shes kyis byas pa'i las rnams byed kyi/ nga rgyal gyis byas pa rnams myi byed de/ de ye shes kyis ngag gi las byed pa mi 'khu ba dang / g.yo ba dang / gya kyu dang / tshul 'chos pa thams cad kyi
323b3(mdo): byed de/ bden par smra zhing 'phra ma dang / ngag nub po dang / tshig khyal ba myi smra ba yin/ phan pa'i tshig dang / ran pa'i tshig dang / chos kyi tshig dang / do tshig de dag smra ste/ tshig des bdag dang gzhan la gdung bar myi
323b4(mdo): 'gyur ro// tshig gang sangs rgyas kyis rjes su gnang ba don dang ldan pa'i tshig smra ste/ tshig des sems can thams cad tshim par byed/ do// de myi kan myi 'tshig ste/ ye shes dang ldan pa'i tshig dang ldan
323b5(mdo): ba yin gyi/ nga rgyal dang rab tu ldan pa ma yin no// de chos yang // dag par blangs pa 'di dang ldan pas/ byang chub thob pa na/ de// bzhin gshegs pa dag gi las thams cad sngon du ye shes 'gro
323b6(mdo): zhing ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba zhes bya ste/ de la de yod do// rin po che'i 'byung gnas kyi ting nge 'dzin shi nad tu bsgoms pa dang / 'khor gsum gyi gzungs la mkhas pas/ de bzhin gshegs
323b7(mdo): pa'i ngag gi las ci yang kyi brjod kyang / de skad thams cad las sgra brnyan dang / 'khor thams cad kyi sems kyi bsam pa rnam par byed pa'i sgra 'byung ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyi gsung sgra dang /
323b8(mdo): dbyangs ni/ don dang ldan pa chos dang ldan pa/ bded pa dang mthun pa/ rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang / myi 'gal ba yid du 'byung ba dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba dang / 'thun pa nye bar zhi bar 'gyur ba
323b9(mdo): 'bras bu song pa nas kyi ngan las 'das pa'i bar gyi churang gyu dpa yod te/ bu mo 'di ni bzhi gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ches ma 'dres pa bcu bzhi pa'o// bu ma gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' byang
324a1(mdo): sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ rtag tu rgyun myi 'chad par ye shes kyis byas pa'i las rnams byed kyi/ nga rgyas kyis byas pa rnams myi byed de/ de ye shes kyis yid kyi las byed pa ni 'khu ba dang /
324a2(mdo): g.yo dang / gya gyu dang / tshul 'chos pa thams cad myi byed do// brnab sems dang gnod sems dang / log par lta ba dang bral zhing yang dag par lta ba yin/ byams pa dang / snying rje la gnas te/ sems can thos
324a3(mdo): cad la sems snyoms shing / byang chub kyi sems brjed pa myed pa yin no// de ye shes dang rab tu ldan pa'i yid dang ldan pa yin gyi/ nga rgyal dang rab tu ldan pa ma yin no// de chos yang dag par blangs pa 'od dang /
324a4(mdo): ldan pas/ byang chub thob pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i yid kyi las thams cad sngon du ye shes 'gro zhing ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba zhes bya ste/ de la de yong ngo // da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas
324a5(mdo): mngon gsum du bzhugs pa'i ting nge 'dzin shin tu bsgom/ sa pa dang / bdag rnyog pa myed pa'i gzungs mkhas pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa sems gcig gis sems can thams cad
324a6(mdo): kyi sems rab tu shes so// sems can thams cad sgyu ma lta bu dang / sems can thams cad rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i phyir/ rang gi sems mnyam pa nyid kyis sems can thams cad kyi/
324a7(mdo): sems mnyam pa nyid du khong du chud pa yin no// sems can thams cad kyi sems mnyam pa nyid kyis/ rang gi sems mnyam pa nyid du khong du chud pa yin no// lus thams cad gzugs brnyan lta bu'i phyir/ rang
324a8(mdo): gyi chos nyid kyis/ sems can thams cad kyi lus kyi chos nyid khong du chud pa yin no// sems can thams cad kyi lus kyi chos nyid kyis/ rang gi lus chos nyid 'ong du chud pa yin no// rang gi lus sems can
324a9(mdo): thams kyi lus kyi rjes su 'jug cing yang dag par 'du ba yin no// sems can thams cad kyi lus rang gi lus kyi rjes su 'jug cing yang dag par 'du ba yin no// sems can thams cad kyi lus sangs rgyas kyi
324b1(mdo): skur byin gyis rlob po// de'i byin kyi rlabs de ni lha dang / bcas pa'i 'jig rten dang / bdud dang bcas pa dang / tshangs par bcas pa dang / dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgu dang / lha dang myi drang lha/
324b2(mdo): ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gang gis kyang g.yos pa'am/ bskyod par myi nus te/ bu mo 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo lnga pa'o// bu mo gzhan yang byang chub seMs
324b3(mdo): dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa pyod pa na/ 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi ye shes chags pa myed pa thob pa na/ mos shing yid ches te/ the tsom myi ze nem nur myed cing / myi sdang la kun tu myi
324b4(mdo): sdang zhing / myi skrag la kun tu skrag par myi 'gyur te/ sangs rgyas kyi yul bsam gyis myi khyab pa la yang mos pa yin no// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gi lus
324b5(mdo): kyi las dang / lus kyi spyod lam yongs su dag pa/ chags pa myed cing sgrib pa myed pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam zas// cad kyi rjes su song ba la mos so// 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs
324b6(mdo): pa de dag gi ngag gi las 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du khyab pa'i dbyangs sgra brjod pa chags pa myed cing / sgrub pa mye pa la/ bsam gyis myi khyab pa thams cad dang / sangs rgyas
324b7(mdo): kyi sgra skad dang / dbyangs dang / chos kyi sgo tshad myed pa bstan pa thams cad kyi rjes su song ba la mos so// 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi sems kyi las dus thams cad dang / zhing thams cad
324b8(mdo): dang / sangs rgyas thams cad dang / chos thams cad dang / sems can thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang / 'gro ba thams cad kyi
324b9(mdo): las kyi rnam par smin pa shi nad tu rnam par phye ba/ rnam par 'byed pa la mos so// 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi 'od zer ka dra ba bkod pa/ chags pa myed cing sgrib pa myed pa la yang mos shing
325a1(mdo): xxx
325a2(mdo): gzhan das kya mas pa'i chos nyid rnas pa 'di lta bu yang dag par 'dzin pa tu 'dug go// de chos yang dgu par blangs pa 'di dang ston pa'is byang chub thob pa ma 'das pa'i nus la de bzhin gshenas na'i leshes
325a3(mdo): mthong ba chags pa myed cing thogs pa myed pa 'jug pa zhes bya ste/ de la de yod do// dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin shin tu bsgoms pa dang / slob brjid dang ldan pa'i gzungs la mkhas pas/ de bzhin gas
325a4(mdo): pa 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi mtshan tha dad pa dang / tshe'i tshad tha dad pa rabs bzhin du brda' srod pa'i mtha' ni myi rtogs so// de bzhin du 'das pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / nyan thos
325a5(mdo): rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams dang / sems can rnams// dang / sems can gyi spyod pa rnams dang / sems can gyi myod da pa byed pa'i las kyi rnam par smyind pa so sor myong ba rnams dang /
325a6(mdo): de bzhin du 'das pa'i bskal pa thams cad de bskal pa gang dag/ sangs rgyas dang bcas pa dag dang / bskal pa gang dag/ sangs rgyas myed pa dag dang / skal pa gang dag la de bzhin
325a7(mdo): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ji snyed byung ba'i bskal pa de dag go// rims bzhin du 'jal sang pa'i mtha' ni myi rtogs so// de bzhin du 'das pa'i 'jig rten gi khams
325a8(mdo): ca kyi rtse pa dadang pa dang / gabadag kun nas nyon mongs pa can dag dang / gang dag nams pa gang dag chung ba dag dang / gang dag rjen gyu pa dag dang / gang dag pa bdag dang / gang dag dgus pa dag dang / gang+ga /
325a9(mdo): dzin pa'i ris sa padan dang / na gyi ma rgyags padag dang rang 'dun 'das dang / gang dag rkyog dang phyogs ma ma sa rnam pa rig dag pa dang / rkyes 'argya rnas pa gyi
325b1(mdo): la 'jug pa'i rjes su zhugs pa/ 'das pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams de dag thams cad go rims bzhin du bda' khrod pa'i mtha' ni myi rtogs so// de lnga de bzhin gshegs po la lung bstan pa thams cad la mongs
325b2(mdo): pa myed de/ lag ma la la dang / sor mo lnga mthong ba'i tshul du de bzhin gshegs pa'i seshes kyis thams cad shes te/ bu mo 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chom ma 'dres pa bcu drug pa'o// bu mo gas
325b3(mdo): snang byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ ma 'ongs pa'i de bzhi gshegs pa rnams kyi so gas cags pa myed pa thos na/ spos zhes sod ces te/ cos kyi/ nem nur myo \u0f7f
325b4(mdo): myi sdud kyi skrag/ skrag par myi 'gyur te/ sangs rgyas kyi yubasam gyis myi khyab pa la yang mo sa la yin no// ma 'ongs pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sa
325b5(mdo): rgyas de dag gi lus dang / lus kyi las dang / lus kyi spyod/ lam yongs su dag pa/ chags pa myed cing sgrib pa myed pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad kyi rjes su song ba
325b6(mdo): mos so// ma 'ongs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gang gi las 'jig rten gi khams thams cad du khyab pa'i dbyangs brjod pa chags pa myed cing / sgrub pa myed la/ bsam gyis myi khyab pa
325b7(mdo): thams cad dang / sangs rgyas kyi sgra skad dang dbyangs dang / chos kyi sgo tshad myed pa bstan pa thams cad kyi rjes su song ba la mos so// ma 'ongs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi sems kyi las dus bams
325b8(mdo): pad dang / 'ang mams cad dang / ma rgyas thams cad dang / chos thams pad dang / sems can thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams pa dang / na thos dang rang sangs rgyas mams cad nga/
325b9(mdo): xxx
326a1(mdo): mos shing yid ches te/ be com myi nga/ nem nur myed cing / myi sdung kyi skrag/ skrag par gyi 'gyur te/ sangs rgyas kyi yul bsam kyis myi khyab pa la ya ba mos pa yin no// sems cad gzhan dag
326a2(mdo): kyang mos pa'i chos nyid rnam pa 'di lta bu yang dag par 'dzind tu 'jug go// de chos yang dag par blangs pa 'di dang ldan pas/ byang chub thob pa na/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus la de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes mthong ba
326a3(mdo): chags pa myed cing thogs pa myed pa 'jug pa zhes bya ste/ de la de yod do// snying rje chen po'i stobs dang / smon lam yang dag par 'phags pa'i ting nge 'dzin de shin tu bsgoms pa dang / seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa
326a4(mdo): 'i gzungs la mkhas pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa ma 'ongs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mtshan tha dad pa dang / tshe'i tshad tha dad pa rabs bzhin du brda srod pa'i mtha' ni myi rtogs so// de bzhin du
326a5(mdo): ma 'ongs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / nyan thos/ rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams dang / sems can rnams dang / sems can gyi spyod pa rnams dang / sems can kyi las
326a6(mdo): rnams dang / sems can gyi rnam par smind pa so sor myong ba rnams dang / de bzhin du ma 'ongs pa'i bskal pa thams cad de/ bskal pa gang dag sangs rgyas dang bcas pa dag dang / gang
326a7(mdo): ngag sangs rgyas myed pa dag dang / bskald pa gapal de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ji snyed 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i bskal pa de dag go// rims bzhin du brda' mang pa'i
326a8(mdo): mtha' ni myi rtogs so// de bzhin du ma 'ongs pa'i 'jig rten gyi 'ams thams cad kyi mying tha dad pa dang / gang dag kun nas nyon mongs pa can dag dang gang dag rnam par dag pa dang / gang dag chung ba dag dang / ka
326a9(mdo): dag cher gyu rad pa dag dang / gang dag za ba dag dang / gang dag rags pa dag dang / gang dag dus phra rab la 'jug pa'i rjes su zhugs pa dang / gang dag gye'u tshugs dag dang / gang dag mthun pa dag dang / gang
326a10(mdo): mtha' ni myi rtogs so// des de bzhin gshegs pa lung bstan pa thams cad sa myongs pa myed de/ sug sa 'is pa ma sa su mthong ba'i tshus du de ba'i gshen pa segs kyis thams ca gis te/ nu 'i 'di
326a11(mdo): ni bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcu bdun pa'o// bu mo gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i gyad sde myod pa na/ bskur thung ba lo sangs rgyas rnams kyis shes chan /
326a12(mdo): pa myed pa thos na/ mos shing yid ches te/ the tsom myi za/ nem nur myed cing / myi sdang myi skrag/ skrag par myi 'gyur te// sangs rgyas kyi yul bsam gyis myi khyab pa la yang mos pa yin no// da ltar byung
326a13(mdo): ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i// sangs rgyas de dag gi lus kyi las dang / lus kyi spyod lam yongs su dag pa/ chags pa myed cing sgrib pa myed pa/ 'jig rten
326a14(mdo): khams rab 'byam thams cad kyi rjes su song ba sa mos so// da ltar byung ba'i de bzhi gshegs pa de dag gi ngag gi las dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du khyab pa'i dbyangs smra chags pa/
326a15(mdo): rnyed cing / sgrub pamyed / bas skyes kyi chub pa rnamapa cang dang/ sangs rgyas kyi sgra skad dang / yungs dang / chos kyi sgo rang myed pa bsod pa mams cad kyi rjes su song ba mtshos so// ngalta byung ba'i
326a16(mdo): bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi sems kyi las dus thams cad dang / 'ang thams cad chom sems par dang / sems can thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpal thams cad dang / nyan thos dang rab sangs
326a17(mdo): rgyas thams cad dang / 'gro tha thams cad kyims kyi rnam par smin bzhin bya rnam par bye ba/ rnam pas byed pa la mos so// daltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi 'ad gzer gyi rbab bkod pa/ cas
327a1(mdo): pa myed cing sgrib pa myed pa la yang mos shing / yid ches te/ the tsom gyi ba/ nem nur myed cing myi sdang myi skrag/ skrag par myi 'gyur te// sangs rgyas kyi yul bsam kis myi khyab pa la yang mos pa
327a2(mdo): yin no// sems can gzhan dag kyang mos pa'i chos nyid rnam pa 'di lta bu yang dag par 'dzin tu 'jug go// de chos yang dag par blangs pa 'di dang ldan pas/ byang chub thob pa na/ da ltar byung ba'i dus la de
327a3(mdo): bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes mthong ba chags pa myed cing thogs pa myed pa 'jug pa zhes bya ste/ de la de yod do// shin du dkar ba dri ma myed pa'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin shin tu bsgoms pa dang / rdo rje'i dkyil
327a4(mdo): 'khor gi gzungs la mkhas pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mtshan tha dad pa dang / tshe'i tsha da tha dad pa rabs bzhin du brda' spyod pa'i mtha' ni myi rtogs so//
327a5(mdo): de bzhin du da ltar byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / nyan thos rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams dang / sems can/ rnams dang / sems can gi spyod pa rnams dang / las rnams
327a6(mdo): dang / las gi rnam par smin pa so sor myong ba rnams ko rim sa bzhin du bda' sprod pa ni mtha' ni myi rtogs so// de bzhin du da ltar byung ba'i bskal pa thams cad de/ bskal pa gang
327a7(mdo): ngag sangs rgyas dang bcas pa dag dang / gang dag sangs rgyas myed pa dag dang / bskald pa gang la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ji snyed byung ba'i bskal pa de dag ko rim/
327a8(mdo): bzhin du brda sprod pa'i mtha ni myi rtogs so// de bzhin du da ltar byung ba'i 'jig rten ga khams thams cad mying tha dad pa dang / gang dag kun nas nyon mongs pa can dag dang / gang dag rnam par dag pa dang gang dag
327a9(mdo): chu phadag dang / gang dag cher gyur pa dang / gar dag phra ba dag dang / gang dag rags pa dag dang / gang dag rdul phra rab la 'jug pa'i rjes su zhugs pa dag dang / gang dag spyi bo tshugs pa dag dang / gang dag
327b1(mdo): 'thun pa dag dang / gang dag phyogs dang / phyogs dang mtshams rnams par gzhag pa dang / myig 'phrul rnam par dpe ba la 'jug pa'i rjes su zhugs pa/ da ltar byung ba'i 'jig rten gi khams de dag thams cad/
327b2(mdo): go rims bzhin du brda' sprod pa'i mtha' ni myi rtogs so// de la de bzhin gshegs pa lung bstun pa thams cad la dmongs pa myed de/ lag 'thil dang sor mo lnga mthong ba'i tshul du/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes
327b3(mdo): kyis thams cad shes te/ bu mo 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyangad pa'o// bco brgyad po 'di dag las sogs pa sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa thams cad thob ste/ thams
327b4(mdo): dag zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ lus chad myed pa dang / thams cad zil gis gnod cing thams cad du khyad par du 'phags pa'i phyir spyi gtsug ltar mi mthong ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas
327b5(mdo): kyi chos ma 'dres pa dang / lus rtsi sman dang / 'dra' ba'i phyir mthong ma thag du sems can rnams kyi skyon zhi bar byed pa dang // thams cad du kha na ma tho ba myed pas/ 'khor thams cad las
327b6(mdo): mngon par 'phags pa dang / myi 'jigs pa rab tu thob pas bag tsha ba myed pa dang / yang dag par sbyong bas slob ma bsam pa can dang / kang ma ngag dang / rjes su bstand pa dang mthun pas
327b7(mdo): slob ma myi byed pa dang / sems can thams cad la mtshungs par gnas pas/ slob ma shin tu dul ba dang / chos bstand pa la the tsom myed pas spobs pa myur ba dang gleng ba myed pas sems can thams cad tshim
327b8(mdo): par byed pa dang / don yod pa'i chos stond pa dang / 'dul ba rnams kyi dbang po yongs su smyin pas/ 'khor thams cad rtse gcig tu sems pa la/ sangs rgyas gi sgra skad 'byin pa dang / cho 'phrul bsam
327b9(mdo): kyis myi khyab pas/ 'khor ki dkyil 'khor thams cad kyis mngon du lta pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku bsod nams tshad myed pas/ brtan pa'i phyir blta bas kyi ngoms pa dang / yang dag par khong du chud pas/
328a1(mdo): 'bras bu yod pa'i chos ston pa dang // smon lam gyi 'khrugs pas glang po'i lta stangs kyis lta ba dang / spro ba che bas seng ge ltar rnam par bsgyings pa dang / lus gi las ye shes sngon du 'gro bas don
328a2(mdo): yod par rnam par 'gro ba dang / ngag gi las ye shes sngon 'gro bas ngag la dbang ba dang / yid gi las ye shes sngon du 'gro bas kun nas myig dang ldan pa dang / spobs pa myur bas gzung bar 'os pa'i tshig dang ldan
328a3(mdo): pa dang / bla na myed pa'i sbyin gnas su gyur bas rnyed pa'i mchog dang / grags pa'i mchog dang ldan pa dang / chos gi dbyings kyis klas shing mthas gtugs pas bsod nams zad myi shes pa dang / mthu bo che chen
328a4(mdo): po'i lus dang / stobs bcu dang / myi 'jigs pa'i mchog thob pas rdzi ba myed pa dang / sems can thams cad gi dbang po mchog dang / mchog ma yin pa shes pas/ sems can la bde ba bskyed pa las
328a5(mdo): phyir ldog cing 'khrul pa myed la// brel 'phongs pa myed pa dang 'jig rten thams cad kyi stond par gyur pas/ chos dang gtsug/ lag mang po shes pa dang / chos kyi skus rab tu phye bas tshe dpag
328a6(mdo): tu myed pa dang / shin tu mur thug cing mthas klas pas mthong ba dang / reg pa dang bsnyen bkur byas pas dang / dran pa dang thos pa de ni yod pa dang / dus gsum mnyam pa nyid khong du chud pas
328a7(mdo): shes rab myi 'khrugs pa dang / chos smra zhing nye bar smra ba myed pas/ gtam rgyun chags pa dang / myi dge ba'i chos thams cad ma lus par spangs pas/ bag chags thams cad yang dag par bcom pa dang /
328a8(mdo): sangs rgyas kyi chos rang byung bas slob dpon myed pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma lus par khong du chud pas/ rnam pa thams cad shes pa ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa 'di dag thams cad rab tu 'thob po/
328a9(mdo): de nas bcom ldan 'das la bu mo rin chen gis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis po 'di dag/ sngon dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs gang dag
328b1(mdo): la zhugs na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis mngon par bsgrub/ de skad ces gsol dra pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bu mo rin can la 'di skad ces bka' stsalar to//

329a1(mdo): par yang dag par spyad pas grub po// mgur du lta bu ni sngon nad pa rnams la sman sna tshogs byin pas grub po// 'gram pa seng ge'i 'gram lta bu ni sngon dge ba'i rtsa ba la sbyor bas yongs su rdzogs par

332a7(mdo): skye mched la myi spyod pa 'di ni chos spyod pa'o// gang na kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba'i rlom sems la myi spyod pa dang / gang na ril po dang / rdzas la myi spyod pa dang / gang na bdag dang / sems can
332a8(mdo): dang / srog dngagaso pa dang / skyes nu dang / ga dang / gdalas skyes pa dang / ke bu 'dzind pa dang / b+h+yo 'dogs pal gyi spyong pa dang / gangan sde ba dang / 'jig pa dang / nas pas kyi myong ba
332a9(mdo): gangan pa la na pa dang / ma 'dzin pas kyi spyong pa dang / gang na pa dang / ra pas kyi sri pa dang / mkhar 'dzin pams pal gyi spyod pa dang / dbus la mngon par zhen pas gyi byung pa dang
332b1(mdo): bdas dang chos gi ngobo nyid kyi gnas dang / gnas myed pa'i gnas dang / chos kyi rang bzhin gyis gnas dang / chos thams cad kyi gnas dang / song ba dang / myi spong ba'i gnas dang / shin du tu gnas pa'i gnas
332b2(mdo): dang / chos thams cad kyi gsol ba dang / gnas sbed pa dang / ro bo nyid med pa dang / rgyub myed pa dang / spos pa myed pa dang / thang ba skyed pa dang / dor ba byed pa dang / khamra me nang pa myed pa dang / len pa
332b3(mdo): myed pa dang / gang chos 'di gas la shes pas/ rlol sems kyang myed pa 'di ni yang dag pa dang / de kho da dang // de bzhin nyid dang / chos zhes pa zhes bya'o// bu mo byang chub sems dpal gang 'di la bur chos
332b4(mdo): thams cad khong du chud nas/ sems can gzhan dag la 'dul ba'i phyir/ 'khor ba la yang spyod la/ mya ngan las 'das pa'i chos nyid las kyang myi g.yo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la yang dag
332b5(mdo): phul yin no// chos spyod pa bstan pa 'di bshad pa na/ bya chub sems dpa' brgyad stong ni/ bzod pa rab tu thob par gyur to// bu mo rin cen gis ni/ mu tika gi so mo do bye ba brgya
332b6(mdo): rib/ bcom ldan 'das la bus nas/ tshig 'di skad ces swA sa so// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' gang chos spyod pa 'di la/ brtson pa 'di ni/ chos thams cad la brtson pa
332b7(mdo): lags so// de'i lung bstand pa ni 'di lags te// byang chub kyi snying po la gnas nas/ bdud dang phyir rgol ba bcom ste/ phyir myi ldog pa'i phyag rgyas btab par blta'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i
332b8(mdo): bus/ bu mo rin cen la 'di skad ces smras so// bu mo khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi phyir myi ldog pa'i phyag rgya shes sam// de nas bu mo rin chen gis de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu ya/ tshigs
332b9(mdo): su ba ba 'di dgams so// 'dis ma nyid sems can 'ams// yang dag nyid kyim sa nyam rtogs nas// gnyis kyi rtogs pa gang yin la// don gyi ldog phyag rgya min// gang dag 'das pa'i
333a1(mdo): rgyas dang // da ltar byung dang ma byon pa// thams cad chos kyi dbyings mnyam par// rtogs pa de dag phyir myi ldog/ gang yang 'dus byas khams rnams dang // gang yang 'dus ma byas pa'i khams//
333a2(mdo): dben pa'i don gis stong par ni// khong du chud pa phyir myi ldog/ sngon gi mtha' ni mtha' yas pa// de'i tshad ni myi dmyigs pa// sems kyi skad cig gcig ldan la// khong du de chud phyir myi ldog/ 'jig rten pa'i
333a3(mdo): chos gang dag/ spyod par brtags pa'i spyod yul rnams// shes rab kyis ni de rtogs pa// gang yin de dag phyir myi ldog/ bdud gi yul ni ji snyed pa// gang gis sangs rgyas yul rnams dang // de dag myi
333a4(mdo): gnyis shes pa ni// phyag rgyas 'di yis btab pa yin// 2dod chags zhe sdang gti / nyon mongs gang dag mtha' yas pa// gang gis rtogs pa'i rtsa ba las// byung bar shes pa phyir myi ldog/ khor
333a5(mdo): ba dang ni mya ngan 'das// byang chub zhi bar bstan pa yang // tha dad ma yin kun mnyam par// khong du chud pa'i phyir myi ldog/ phung po ji bzhin byang chub ste// phung po byang chub myi gnyis shing //
333a6(mdo): sgyu ma 'dra bar mnyam shes te// rnam rtog myed pa de dag mkhas gang yang khams rnams bzhi po dag/ nam mkha' mtshungs pa'i khams yI ti// gzung myed khong du chud pa ni// yang dag phyag
333a7(mdo): rgyas btab pa yin// myig ni byang chub byang chub myin// sangs rgyas kyis ni stong par gsungs// ji ltar myig bzhin byang chub ste// rtag tu mnyam pa nyid kyis mnyam// de ltar skye mched thams cad kyang
333a8(mdo): rtag tu stong ste byang chub mnyam// tshul 'di rab du shes pa dag/ phyag rgya des ni btab pa yin// sems can rnams ni kun gi sems// sems cig gis ni rab shes pa// de ni rdzogs pa'i byang chub las//
333a9(mdo): phyir myi ldog par the tsom myed// sems can kun ki dbang po ni// rab dang 'bring dang tha ma yin// pha rol tu phyind pa gang yin pa// de dag phyir myi ldog pa yin// thogs pa myed pa'i spobs pa yis//
333b1(mdo): rgyun myi 'chad par rgyun tu yang // bskal pa bye bar brjod kyang go// de'i bsngags pa de myi zad// nam mkha'i khams ni zad 'gyur la// rlung ni zhags pas bzung 'gyur srid// de ni spobs pa 'jig rten gis
333b2(mdo): zad par bya bar yong myi nus/ kA gis sems ni mi dmongs shing // zos pa 'ang chung zar myi 'gyur ba// chos rnams thams cad 'dzind pa'i// gzungs ni de dag gyod yul yin// phyogs bcu kun gi 'dren pa yis
333b3(mdo): dam pa'i chos gang bshad pa// gzungs thob pas ni de thams cad// dran pa dang ni shes pas 'dzin// gzungs ni shi nad tu bslabs pas na// sngon gi bskald pa bye bar ni// skyob pa rnams kyi chos zos pa// de dag
333b4(mdo): dris nas stond par 'gyur// phyir myi ldog pa gang yin pa// de dag gzungs ni 'di 'dra ste// spobs pa dag kyang 'di 'dral zhing // de dag ye shes 'di 'dra'o// chos rnams phyag rgya stong pa nyid//
333b5(mdo): rnam sbyin myed cing bsal myed pa// stong pa'i phyag rgyas gang btab// pa// de dag phyir myi ldog par bstan// nam mkha'i phyag rgyas btab/ pa'i chos// rang bzhin kis ni 'byung myed par// mtha' ni khod
333b6(mdo): du rab chud la// phyag rgyas btab pa phyir myi ldog// chos ni / na nas 'byung ba ste// rgyu myed pa'i chos myed do// chos gang rgyal sa byung ba dag/ de'i mtshan nyid 'gog pa'o// chos rnams kun
333b7(mdo): gi mtshan nyid ni// nam mkha' mnyam pa'i mtshan nyid de// mtshan nyid phyag rgya de 'dra ba'i// phyag rgyas gang btab phyir myi ldog/ phyir myi ldog pa gang yin pa// sems can kun gi spyod pa dang // gzugs dang
333b8(mdo): spyod lam dus rnams dang // skad cig gcig la rab tu ston // sbyin pa'i tshogs ni mtha' yas te// bsod nams rtag tu myi dad pa// gal te ro gcig 'gyur na ni// nam mkha'i khams kyang gang bar 'gyur// de
333b9(mdo): dag tshul khrims tshe ba nyid// sangs rgyas tshul khrims/ 'byung gnas te// dpag tu myed cing mtha' yang myed// nam mkha' yid ni dbyings dang 'dra// sems can kun dang nyan thos dang // rgyal ba re re'i tshul khrims ni//
334a1(mdo): xxx
334a2(mdo): dedag na 'am nyid// yang dag tshan pa ga da// baN+Dal la satu myed pa ste// sems pa na rnams pa rim par byed// btan patag tu ma na// myed sa byed ci shin
